titles.title: Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H.Res. 1000) providing for earmarking reform in the House of Representatives.
Providing for the adoption of the resolution (H.Res. 1000) providing for earmarking reform in the House of Representatives.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 109-654, by Mr. Dreier.
Upon the adoption of H. Res. 1003, H. Res. 1000, amended by the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Rules now printed in the resolution, will hereby be adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 228.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1003.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 194 (Roll no. 448).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 245 - 171 (Roll no. 449).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 1000 (earmark revisions in the House of Representatives).
